question: Match the following secondary oocyte and follicle-related terms with their NCERT-based descriptions:
column_I: Process of release of secondary oocyte
column_II: Retains bulk of nutrient rich cytoplasm of primary oocyte
Uncertain if divides further or degenerates
matches: Secondary oocyte cytoplasm–Retains bulk of nutrient rich cytoplasm of primary oocyte
Fate of first polar body–Uncertain if divides further or degenerates
Tertiary follicle changes into–Mature follicle or Graafian follicle
Membrane formed by secondary oocyte–Zona pellucida
Process of release of secondary oocyte–Ovulation
